summary: This module contains a suite of pytest-based tests that validate the behavior of the Least Busy routing strategy within the Litellm framework. It checks deployment discovery, model registration, and both standard and streaming completion workflows, leveraging asynchronous execution and environment configuration.
business_intent: Ensure reliable loadâ€‘balancing and correct routing of AI model requests in production environments by confirming that the Least Busy algorithm selects appropriate deployments and handles streaming responses without errors.
